text: Ridgewood is a village in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the village population was 25,979. Ridgewood is a suburban bedroom community of New York City. It is about northwest of Manhattan. Ridgewood was ranked 26th in Money magazine's "Best Places to Live" in America, 2011.Staff. "Best Places to Live 2011: #26 Ridgewood, NJ", CNNMoney, backed uo by the Internet Archive as of September 28, 2011. Accessed April 3, 2017. ==References== Category:Villages in New Jersey Category:Settlements in Bergen County, New Jersey
title: Ridgewood, New Jersey
